description: Creative Enzymes is a leading figure in the field. We offer services for enzyme conjugation, especially with small molecules. We satisfy various customer needs by using both chemical and enzymatical strategies. Conjugation with specified enzyme-to-molecule ratios could also be realized. Finally, with a streamline of purification and characterization procedures, we deliver enzyme conjugates with high purity and reliable structural data.
name: Enzyme Conjugation with Small Molecules
